text: Wrestling was one of the many sports which was held at the 1997 West Asian Games in Tehran, Iran between 22 and 23 November 1997. The competition took place at Shohada 7th Tir Stadium. ==Medalists== ===Freestyle=== {| |- |54 kg | | | |- |58 kg | | | |- |63 kg | | | |- |69 kg | | | |- |76 kg | | | |- |85 kg | | | |- |97 kg | | |None awarded |- |130 kg | | | |} ===Greco-Roman=== {| |- |54 kg | | | |- |58 kg | | | |- |63 kg | | | |- |69 kg | | | |- |76 kg | | | |- |85 kg | | | |- |97 kg | | | |- |130 kg | | | |} ==Medal table== ==References== *UWW Database ==External links== *Official website West Asian Games 1997 West Asian Games Category:1997 West Asian Games
title: Wrestling at the 1997 West Asian Games
